EmailTemplate.name: PRM ARR General - Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Additional_Resource_Request__c.Additional_Resource__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {Partner Name},
Your access request for NDAC Offer and Order Tool has been approved.
You can now access this tool on the Nokia DAC Info Center. User guides to get you started can be found here.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact our Nokia Partner support desk at: partner.support@nokia.com
The Nokia Global Partner Team
